description.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a mist that stops
reduction of abilities.
description.emerald:
Creates a mist that stops
reduction of abilities.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The ally party is
protected by a
mist that prevents
stat reductions.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user cloaks its
body with a white mist
that prevents any of
its stats from being
cut for five turns.
description.platinum:
The user cloaks its
body with a white mist
that prevents any of
its stats from being
cut for five turns.

The user cloaks its
body with a white mist
that prevents any of
its stats from being
cut for five turns.
description.black-white:
The user cloaks its body with a white mist
that prevents any of its stats from being
cut for five turns.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user cloaks its body with a white mist
that prevents any of its stats from being
cut for five turns.
description.x-y:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a
white mist that prevents any of their stats
from being lowered for five turns.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a
white mist that prevents any of their stats
from being lowered for five turns.
description.sun-moon:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist
that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist
that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.
description.sword-shield:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist
that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.

effect.full:
Pokémon on the user's side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns.

guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.shortEffect: Protects the user's stats from being changed by enemy moves.
